# TrackMyRupee

> The best personal finance tracker for India. Track expenses, manage budgets, and visualize your spending.

## Overview
TrackMyRupee is a comprehensive financial management tool designed for the Indian market. It provides a precision dashboard and intelligent analysis to turn financial chaos into clarity.

## Key Features
- **Expense & Income Tracking**: Comprehensive logging with category support and bulk actions.
- **Budget Management**: Set and monitor monthly budget limits for different categories.
- **Analytics & Insights**: Deep-dive visualizations of spending trends and category-wise analysis.
- **Smart Notifications**: Automated reminders for recurring bills, subscriptions, and budget limits.
- **Security First**: Data encryption at rest and in transit, with automated backups.
- **Progressive Web App (PWA)**: Installable on mobile devices for a native app experience.
- **Multi-lingual Support**: Fully internationalized with support for English, Hindi, and Marathi.

## Important Links
- [Home Page](https://trackmyrupee.com/)
- [Security & Privacy](https://trackmyrupee.com/security/)
